ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MTSU Terminated Folded Dipole and FSX-6S spectrograph system
ResourceHeader.Description:
Terminated Folded Dipole and FSX-6S 12 bit switching
   dual polarization spectrograph system at the Middle Tennessee State
   University.
The TFD is a 4 element (26 foot) square array. Each antenna element is 24
feet long. Bandwidth is 30 KHz. Polarization is simulataneous RCP
and LCP. TFD array is aligned to true north. The FSX-6S spectrograph
operates at 15 -30 MHz simultaneous RCP and LCP.
   
   See the Information URL for a link to a document providing
   additional descriptions of the instrument characteristics.

InformationURL.Name: Radio JOVE Spectrograph Users Group
InformationURL.Description: This site provide station diagrams and other reports for the receiver systems at several radio observatories associated with the Radio JOVE project.

Instrument.InvestigationName: Terminated Folded Dipole and FSX-6S spectrograph at MTSU
